column5: Hey Guys,  I'm participating in a very worthy cause. I'm joining several police services/departments from across the Globe to raise money for prostate cancer. Yes....it's true, I'm growing a mustache for charity!  If you are interested in making a donation, please feel free to donate. It doesn't matter if it's a dollar or twenty, every cent helps.  I know I'm not supposed to post things of this nature on OFC but many of us have lost out brothers, fathers, grandfathers and friends to this terrible disease.  Thanks guys.  Here is the link  https://www.movember.com/ca/donate/your-det...mber_id/135281/  All proceeds go to Prostate Cancer Canada
No problem Dave........as long as you post photo's!
Trust me, it'll be a very scary sight indeed!
I can hear the Village People warming up in the background.   Now, where is my cheque book?
I just had a movember presentation at my school last thursday. great cause.
